document.title: Hot Topic: Confidentiality of Municipal Employees' Personal Information
document.abstract: The scope of the confidentiality of municipal employee personal information is expanded to include home telephone numbers, personal cell phone numbers and residential street addresses.

field.name: comments
field.value:
